title: What is Lucid somnambulism? / Transmission at a distance / Practical exercise
description:
Dr. Paret will explain the state of lucid somnambulism. In this state, the subject is hypersensitive. It is also useful to do spiritual healing. Our students practice non-verbal  transmission from a distance, giuded by Dr Paret. 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Check out some other videos on our channel:

https://youtu.be/p53WjhFI2uw
